ai-ya5.3.6:1.1_0: One who gives up suffering will give up the origin of suffering, but not the cessation of suffering.
ai-ya5.3.6:2.1_0: Or else, when you give up suffering, they will give up suffering.
ai-ya5.3.6:3.1_0: One who doesn’t completely understand suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path.
ai-ya5.3.6:4.1_0: they won’t truthfully make an end of suffering. They won’t give rise to the origin of suffering.
ai-ya5.3.6:4.1_1: They don’t make an end of suffering, and the path to the origin of suffering. They won’t give up suffering.
ai-ya5.3.6:5.1_0: And when you don’t have the truth of suffering, they don’t give up suffering.
ai-ya5.3.6:6.1_0: One who has given up the origin of suffering, but not the truth of suffering.
ai-ya5.3.6:6.1_1: They’re the origin of the path, but don’t make an end of suffering. They won’t give up suffering.
ai-ya5.3.6:8.1_0: The Book of the truths is finished.
